about_page.paragraph_01_content:
I am a freelance developer with over four years of experience in web and mobile development. During this time, I have delivered high-quality projects for various clients, using different technology stacks for both frontend and backend. While my expertise primarily focuses on **Laravel and React**, I'm always open to learning and adopting new technologies. I have worked with multiple clients in my home country, Ecuador, which has allowed me to gain valuable experience and deep knowledge of web development best practices.

My commitment to excellence and continuous improvement drives me to deliver innovative and efficient solutions for every project. Effective communication, collaboration, and analytical thinking are key aspects of my work approach. [... my CV](/resume_en.pdf)
about_page.paragraph_02_content: **React** / React Native / Next.js / **Laravel** / MySQL / HTML5 / CSS / Tailwind / Responsive Design & Mobile-First / Docker / Traefik
